item.title: idea productive tips
item.description: This article is wroten according to a youtube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eq3KiAH4IBI. We use Idea programming everyday. How can we use it effectively, now let’s reading it below: Close the tab list of IDE Preferences → Editor → Editor Tabs; Change Tab Placement from default Top to None. Tab is annoying when many files are opened. It’s hard to find file when opening to many files, which it’s inevitable. Use recent files window or search everywhere (Double Shift).
